A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like Rogue One\, this is a Star Wars film that is willing to do something different. By avoiding some of the standard plot beats and using characters to drive the plot\, the film creates a tension that I didn't think was possible for a Star Wars film. Even Rogue One was constrained by us knowing where it had to end up\, and the Force Awakens held few surprises. So\, the first Star Wars film since the original three with genuine surprises - the new trilogy may escape the shadow of its predeccesors (good and bad).
